paper_abstract: In the last years many solution methods for equilibrium problems (EPs) have been developed. Several different monotonicity conditions have been exploited to prove convergence. The paper investigates all the relationships between them in the framework of the so-called abstract EP. The analysis is further detailed for variational inequalities and linear EPs, which include also Nash EPs with quadratic payoffs.
paper_title: Twelve monotonicity conditions arising from algorithms for equilibrium problems
